name: darshan-runtime

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: apmpi_sync
variants.description: Compile with AutoPerf MPI module (with collective synchronization timing)

description:
Darshan (runtime) is a scalable HPC I/O characterization tool designed
to capture an accurate picture of application I/O behavior, including
properties such as patterns of access within files, with minimum
overhead. DarshanRuntime package should be installed on systems where
you intend to instrument MPI applications.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: parallel-netcdf
dependencies.description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.

dependencies.name: papi
dependencies.description:
PAPI provides the tool designer and application engineer with a
consistent interface and methodology for use of the performance counter
hardware found in most major microprocessors. PAPI enables software
engineers to see, in near real time, the relation between software
performance and processor events. In addition Component PAPI provides
access to a collection of components that expose performance measurement
opportunities across the hardware and software stack.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.
